email.subject: Time for fun
email.body:
Nice job!
Now, time for some fun:
----- - Find a game company called "ProtoVision Inc" located somewhere in Sunnevale, California (if you made a scan on the ARPANET Mainframe). They have been working on a cool game called "DOOM.exe".
- Find the game server, hack it, and upload the game to our FTP server (se link). -----
TIP: You may need to get access to multiple terminals first, before you can find the game company...
Thx, - Malvin
Seattle Tech Lab
